item.title: Jenkins Gmail SMTP
item.description: Manage Jenkins > Configure System > E-mail Notification Input your gmail address (also works for Domains with gmail backends) Check "Use SSL" SMTP Port 465 Then, you should receive an email to confirm. Configure and allow sending.
